node.doctext:
[% use Everything::Delegation::htmlpage; my $str = ""; my @nodes = $DB->getNodeWhere({type_nodetype => getNode("htmlpage","nodetype")->{node_id}}); foreach my $n (@nodes) { my $title = $n->{title}; $title =~ s/ /_/g; next if(Everything::Delegation::htmlpage->can($title)); $str .= linkNodeTitle($n->{title})."
"; } return $str; %] [% my $str = ""; foreach my $key (keys %ENV){ $str .= "$key: $ENV{$key}
"; } return $str; %]
node.title: jaybonci's sandbox
